title: Harvard's Education
description: THE MAN AND HIS MISSIONAs a navy SEAL, Harvard had seen his share of trainees before, but P.J. Rogers managed to pack more fire in her five-foot-two-inch body than all the men he'd ever worked with. And he couldn't help hoping for some more personal contact.One thing always-in-control P.J. Rogers couldn't afford to do was let herself get sidetracked. Not now, when her goal was finally within reach. Unfortunately, so was Harvard -- every hard-muscled, pure-male, irresistible inch of him.
author: Suzanne Brockmann
